article_node.title: Renewal of Bigbank AS Strategy
article_node.summary: Bigbank AS has halted its internal ratings‑based (IRB) model rollout after EU Regulation (EU) 2024/1623 reduced the capital advantage of IRB versus standardised approaches. The bank will instead concentrate on improving loan portfolio quality, data management, and model enhancement to optimise capital use and return. The move reflects a broader shift toward capital management amid regulatory tightening, while maintaining a focus on loan quality and efficient capital allocation.
